examples.example: 那部精彩的电影每一帧都让人沉浸其中，感受着独特的魅力。

translate.english: That wonderful movie makes people immersed in every frame and feel the unique charm.

examples.example: 这幅美丽的画作每一处细节、每一帧画面都展现出了艺术家的高超技艺。

translate.english: Every detail and every frame of this beautiful painting shows the superb skills of the artist.

examples.example: 回忆就像一部老电影，每一帧都承载着珍贵的过往和难忘的情感。

translate.english: Memories are like an old movie, each frame carrying precious past and unforgettable emotions.
